api-bounties.title: Trim field surrounding spaces full Hide or get rid of the source textarea.
api-bounties.subTitle: I would like to convert my ChatGPT clone codebase to trim field surrounding need to have full Hide or get rid of the source textarea.

api-bounties.title: Fix issue with navbar on mobile devices
api-bounties.subTitle: The navbar on my website is not displaying correctly on mobile devices. It is overlapping with other elements and causing issues with the layout.

api-bounties.title: Build a custom WordPress plugin
api-bounties.subTitle: I need a custom WordPress plugin built that will allow me to display a list of events on my website. The plugin should be easy to use and customizable.

api-bounties.title: Develop a machine learning model to predict stock prices
api-bounties.subTitle: I need a machine learning model built that can predict stock prices based on historical data. The model should be accurate and reliable.

api-bounties.title: Optimize website loading speed
api-bounties.subTitle: My website is currently loading too slowly and I need someone to optimize it for speed. The website is built using React and Redux.

api-bounties.title: Create a custom Shopify theme
api-bounties.subTitle: I need a custom Shopify theme created that matches my brand and style. The theme should be easy to use and customizable.

api-bounties.title: Build a React Native app for iOS and Android
api-bounties.subTitle: I need a React Native app built for both iOS and Android. The app should include push notifications, in-app purchases, and a simple UI.

api-bounties.title: Create a simple website for a new business
api-bounties.subTitle: I need a simple website created for my new business. The website should have a homepage, an about page, and a contact page.

api-bounties.title: Fix a bug in my existing React app
api-bounties.subTitle: There is a bug in my existing React app that needs to be fixed. The bug causes the app to crash when a certain button is clicked.

api-bounties.title: Build a custom WordPress plugin
api-bounties.subTitle: I need a custom WordPress plugin built that will allow me to easily create and manage custom post types.

api-bounties.title: Develop a machine learning model for sentiment analysis
api-bounties.subTitle: I need a machine learning model developed for sentiment analysis of social media posts. The model should be able to classify posts as positive, negative, or neutral.

api-bounties.title: Create a custom Shopify app
api-bounties.subTitle: I need a custom Shopify app created that will allow me to easily manage my products and orders.

api-bounties.title: Design a logo for my new business
api-bounties.subTitle: I need a professional looking logo designed for my new business. The logo should be unique and reflect the nature of my business.

api-bounties.title: Create a responsive website for my portfolio
api-bounties.subTitle: I want a website to showcase my portfolio. The website should be responsive and easy to navigate.

api-bounties.title: Edit and proofread my blog post
api-bounties.subTitle: I need someone to edit and proofread my blog post before I publish it. The post is about 1000 words long.

api-bounties.title: Develop a mobile app for my business
api-bounties.subTitle: I want a mobile app developed for my business. The app should be available on both Android and iOS platforms.

api-bounties.title: Build an e-commerce website for my business
api-bounties.subTitle: I want an e-commerce website built for my business. The website should be easy to use and have a clean design.

api-bounties.title: Translate a document from English to Spanish
api-bounties.subTitle: I need a document translated from English to Spanish. The document is about 2000 words long.

api-bounties.title: Create a landing page for my startup
api-bounties.subTitle: I need a landing page designed and developed for my startup. The page should be clean, modern, and responsive.

api-bounties.title: Debug and fix issues with my React app
api-bounties.subTitle: I'm having some issues with my React app and need someone to debug and fix them. The app uses Redux for state management.

api-bounties.title: Build a REST API with Node.js
api-bounties.subTitle: I need a REST API built with Node.js for my web application. The API should support CRUD operations and use MongoDB for data storage.

api-bounties.title: Develop a machine learning model for sentiment analysis
api-bounties.subTitle: I need a machine learning model developed for sentiment analysis. The model should be able to classify text as positive, negative, or neutral.

api-bounties.title: Design a logo for my new business
api-bounties.subTitle: I need a logo designed for my new business. The logo should be simple, memorable, and reflect the values of the brand.

api-bounties.title: Build a full-stack web application
api-bounties.subTitle: I need a full-stack web application built for my startup. The app should allow users to sign up, create profiles, and connect with each other.

applications.details: Hello, I am a full-stack developer with expertise in Angular and Node.js. I have previously worked on several chatbot projects and have experience in integrating with various messaging platforms. I can develop a chatbot for Canvas LMS as per your requirements. Please contact me via email or Discord for further discussion.

I am a freelance developer with extensive experience in chatbot development. I have previously worked with Canvas API and can develop a chatbot for your Canvas LMS. The chatbot will have features to log messages, remember students, and preserve context between sessions. Please contact me via email or Discord for further discussion.

I am a software developer with experience in building chatbots using the Dialogflow platform. I can create a chatbot for your Canvas LMS that will assist students in accessing course materials and provide personalized support. Please contact me via email or Discord for further discussion.

I am a software developer with over 5 years of experience in developing web applications. I have experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python. I am confident that I can develop a responsive and user-friendly dashboard for your company. Please contact me if you have any questions or would like to discuss this opportunity further.

I am a data scientist with experience in Python, R, and SQL. I have worked on several projects involving data analysis and machine learning. I am confident that I can build a model to predict the sales of your products. Please contact me if you are interested in working with me.

I am a graphic designer with experience in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. I have worked on several projects including logo design, web design, and branding. I am confident that I can design a logo that represents your brand and resonates with your audience. Please contact me if you are interested in working with me.

I am a full-stack developer with experience in React, Node.js, and MongoDB. I have worked on several projects including e-commerce websites, social networks, and web applications. I am confident that I can build a scalable and performant web application for your company. Please contact me if you are interested in working with me.

I have experience with web scraping and can help you extract the information you need from the website. I can use Python's Beautiful Soup library and Selenium for this task. Additionally, I can provide the data in any format you require, such as CSV or JSON. Please contact me if you're interested in working with me. I'm available to start immediately.

The chatbot will have features to log messages, remember students, and preserve context between sessions. Please contact me via email or Discord for further discussion.

I am confident that I can design a logo that represents your brand and resonates with your audience. Please contact me if you are interested in working with me.
